name: CVE-2012-1225
description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Dolibarr CMS 3.2.0 Alpha and earlier allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) memberslist parameter (aka Member List) in list.php or (2) rowid parameter to adherents/fiche.php.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:*:alpha:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.1.0:rc:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:2.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dolibarr:dolibarr_erp\\/crm:3.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
